TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Grid extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于管理 对象的主要和次要网格的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties that manage the major and minor grids of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供用于在图表上的网格的功能，并使用公开并的每个属性对象。This class provides the functionality for the grids on the chart, and is exposed using the and properties of each object. 主要网格线，默认情况下不具有其， ， ，和属性集。Major grid lines by default do not have their , , , and properties set. 如果未设置这些属性主要网格线，控件将自动确定网格线的相应值。When these properties for major grid lines are not set, the control determines the appropriate values for grid lines automatically. 轴和其次要网格线，默认情况下都有其， ， ，和属性设置为**自动**(0)。The axis and its minor grid lines by default have their , , , and properties set to **Auto** (0). 如果启用了轴标签或次要网格线，并且不会修改这些属性，控件自动确定通常绘制次要网格线的方式。If axis labels or minor grid lines are enabled and these properties are not modified, the control automatically determines how often to draw the minor grid lines. 轴网格：Axis grids: - 可以启用或禁用。Can be enabled or disabled. - 具有起始点，用于确定他们首先绘制的位置。Have a starting point that determines where they are first drawn. - 显示可以为样式、 宽度和颜色设置的行。Display lines that can be set for style, width and color. - 可以自动时间间隔或手动设置的时间间隔。Can have either automatic intervals, or intervals that are set manually.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定是否启用主要或次要网格线。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines whether major or minor grid lines are enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用，则为 ；如果已禁用，则为 。

span.span: if enabled, if disabled.

value.span: 对于主要网格对象，默认值为 ，对于次要网格对象，默认值为 。

span.span: The default is for major grid objects and for minor grid objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要和次要网格会显示启用时，禁用时不可见。Major and minor grids are visible when enabled, and not visible when disabled. 如果禁用，将不显示刻度线。Tick marks will not be displayed if disabled. 可以通过设置禁用刻度属性设置为。You can disable tick marks by setting the property to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Interval { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Interval : double with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置主要网格线或次要网格线之间的间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval between major or minor grid lines.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示网格线之间的间隔。

span.span: A value that represents the interval between grid lines.

value.span: 默认情况下，不对主要网格线设置该值 ()。

span.span: By default, the value is not set () for major grid lines.

value.span: 对于次要网格线，默认值为零 (0)。

span.span: For minor grid lines, the default value is zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下此属性未设置轴标签、 主要刻度线和主要网格线。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未设置 — 通过默认情况下，通过显式使用在设计时或通过分配的值在运行时，此属性的实际值由属性的到对象图表所属的元素，如网格线或刻度线标记。If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly using at design time, or by assigning a value of at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object to which the chart element, such as a grid line or tick mark, belongs. 次要刻度线和网格线的间隔永远不会受属性值。The interval of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the property value. 间隔以轴单位，并且确定何种频率绘制适用图表元素。The interval is measured in axis units, and determines how often an applicable chart element is drawn. 例如，假设柱形图有 1 的 X 轴步骤 （即 1、 2、 3、 4 和等）;如果您设置属性将为 2 到 X 轴显示轴标签为每个其他列。For example, suppose a column chart has an X axis step of 1 (that is, 1, 2, 3, 4, and so forth); if you set the property for the X axis to 2, an axis label will be displayed for every other column. 所有适用的图表元素也是如此。The same holds true for all applicable chart elements. 换而言之，如果在上一示例中条带线中使用了，与为 0.5，并且其属性为 2，条带线将显示在 0.5、 2.5 中，4.5 中，依次类推。In other words, if in the previous example strip lines were being used, with an of 0.5, and their property was 2, a strip line would be displayed at 0.5, 2.5, 4.5, and so on. 如果设置图表元素`Interval`属性设置为零，时间间隔将自动由控件。If you set a chart element `Interval` property to zero, an interval will be automatically determined by the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double IntervalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置网格线的偏移量。

span.span: Gets or sets the offset of grid lines.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示间隔偏移量。

span.span: A value that represents the interval offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下此属性未设置轴标签、 主要刻度线和主要网格线。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未设置-默认情况下，通过在设计时显式指定"未设置"或通过将其分配的值在运行时，此属性的实际值由属性的对象图表元素，如网格线或刻度线，属于。If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly specifying "Not Set"at design time, or by assigning it a value of at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object that the chart element, such as a grid line or a tick mark, belongs to. 值永远不会影响次要刻度线和网格线的间隔偏移量属性的对象。The interval offset of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the property of the object. 属性设置定义的偏移量的度量单位。The property setting defines the units of measurement of the offset. 可以是负值。The can be a negative value.

summary.span: 获取或设置主要网格线和次要网格线的间隔偏移量类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset type of major and minor grid lines.

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the interval type.

value.span: 默认情况下，不对主要网格线设置该值。

span.span: By default it is not set for major grid lines.

value.span: 次要网格线的默认值为 。

span.span: The default value for minor grid lines is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下此属性未设置轴标签、 主要刻度线和主要网格线。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未设置-默认情况下，通过在设计时显式指定"未设置"或通过将其分配的值在运行时，此属性的实际值由属性的对象图表元素，网格线或刻度线将标记中，例如，属于。If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly specifying "Not Set" at design time, or by assigning it a value of at run time—the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object that the chart element—a grid line or tick mark, for example—belongs to. 次要刻度线和网格线的间隔偏移量的类型永远不会受属性值。The interval offset type of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the property value. 如果此时间间隔偏移量类型设置为，则将使用属性。If this interval offset type is set to , the property will be used.

summary.span: 获取或设置主要网格线或次要网格线的间隔类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval type for major or minor grid lines.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值指示间隔类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the interval type.

value.span: 默认情况下，不对轴标签、主要刻度线和主要网格线设置该值，而是使用 枚举值。

span.span: By default it is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines, by using the enumeration value.

value.span: 对于次要刻度线和网格线，默认值为 。

span.span: The default value for minor tick marks and grid lines is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下此属性未设置轴标签、 主要刻度线和主要网格线。By default this property is not set for axis labels, major tick marks and major grid lines. 如果未设置-默认情况下，通过在设计时，显式使用"未设置"或通过将其分配的值在运行时，此属性的实际值由属性对象图表元素-网格线或刻度线将标记中，例如，属于。If it is not set—either by default, by explicitly using "Not Set" at design time, or by assigning it a value of at run time— the actual value of this property is determined by the property of the object that the chart element—a grid line or tick mark, for example—belongs to. 值永远不会受影响的次要刻度线和网格线的间隔类型属性。The interval type of minor tick marks and grid lines is never affected by the value of the property. 可以将间隔类型设置为; 间隔类型然后依赖于的 X 值或 Y 值绘制的对象，具体取决于哪个轴适用的元素属于。Interval types can be set to ; the type of interval then depends on either the X-values or Y-values of the plotted objects, depending on which axis the applicable elements belong to. 设置属性的值轴只会造成影响的数据点的值较或`double`值。Setting the property for a value axis will only have an effect if the values of the data points are or `double` values. 此外，或所绘制的属性必须设置为或。Also, the or property of the plotted must be set to or . 设置类别轴属性只会造成影响，如果属性 (或属性，具体取决于相关轴) 的绘制对象是或.Setting the property for a categorical axis will only have an effect if the property (or property, depending on the axis in question) of the plotted object is either or . > [!NOTE] > 星期日被视为一周的第一天。Sunday is considered the first day of the week.

summary.span: 获取或设置网格线颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the line color of a grid.
A object.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于指定主要和次要刻度线或网格的颜色。The property is used to specify the color of major and minor tick marks or grids.

summary.span: 获取或设置主要网格线和次要网格线的线条宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the line width of major and minor grid lines.

value.span: 一个表示线条宽度（以像素为单位）的 。

span.span: An that represents the line width in pixels.
The default value is one (1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可用于指定线条宽度，以像素为单位，主要和次要刻度线或网格。The property can be used to specify the line width, in pixels, of major and minor tick marks or grids.
